name: Raging Bolt
flavorText: It's said to incinerate everything around it with lightning launched from its fur. Very little is known about this creature.

previous.name: Gouging Fire
previous.flavorText: There are scant few reports of this creature being sighted. One short video shows it rampaging and spouting pillars of flame.

next.name: Iron Boulder
next.flavorText: It resembles a Pokémon described in a dubious magazine as a Terrakion that had been modified by an evil organization.
